channel.title: Comments on: Blue Iris Security Camera DVR Software for Windows

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/index.php/archives/26/comment-page-1#comment-3026">Dave Puhlman</a>.
Yes, I have viewed the images from a mobile device -- iPod Touch and iPhone. It has a very simple web interface that updates the images frequently. You can view one camera or the grid of cameras. It's not fancy--it just works.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dave Puhlman.

Yes, I have viewed the images from a mobile device — iPod Touch and iPhone. It has a very simple web interface that updates the images frequently. You can view one camera or the grid of cameras. It’s not fancy–it just works.

item.title: By: Dave Puhlman
item.dc:creator: Dave Puhlman
item.description: Have you had any experience viewing the images on a mobile device like an iPhone?
item.content:encoded: Have you had any experience viewing the images on a mobile device like an iPhone?
